All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ArrayBlock
As the core component, this class is used for drawing arrays in the GUI.
DataGrid
The minimum data grid in GUI ArrayBlock.
DataGrids
The array to be passed to the ArrayBlock for display.
GridsArray
Deprecated.
GridsLinkedList
As a collection of data, this class passes data between the class Wavelet and the class MyPanel.
Main
This GUI program is created initially to cope with the assignment of the class, Advanced programming in HKA Germany.
MyFrame
The main window for this GUI program.
MyPanel
A component for integrating and wrapping other classes to provide a handy panel.
MySlider
An encapsulation of JSlider.
MyToggleButton
An encapsulation of JToggleButton.
Wavelet
The scaling and detail will be calculated automatically when invoking the constructor.
